title: 一个联机问題。。。。。
author: 吾是新手渣渣
txt_content:
本帖最后由 吾是新手渣渣 于 2013-11-2 22:10 编辑 

RT,它说:

 [INFO] Starting minecraft server version 1.5.1
 [INFO] Loading properties
 [INFO] Default game type: CREATIVE
 [INFO] Generating keypair
 [INFO] Starting Minecraft server on 192.168.1.106:25565
 [WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
 [WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind
 [WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?

=???

replies.author: 萝卜玩mc
replies.txt_content:
吾是新手渣渣 发表于 2013-8-1 15:41 
那多人時sever的ip填?
如果你内网映射了，就是外围ip，如果是hamachi，就是hamachi ip

replies.author: middo
replies.txt_content: IP输入错误…………或者…………你用这IP又开了一个服务端

replies.author: rainsillwood
replies.txt_content:
端口被占用或者系统禁止开放此端口
换一个端口号试试，就是X.X.X.X:X当中冒号后面的数字

replies.author: 萝卜玩mc
replies.txt_content: 你同时开了2个服，如果不是，在设置里面把server-ip：    后面的全部去掉

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
rainsillwood 发表于 2013-8-1 13:34 
端口被占用或者系统禁止开放此端口
换一个端口号试试，就是X.X.X.X:X当中冒号后面的数字
不行呀！Can't crash the sever

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
萝卜玩mc 发表于 2013-8-1 13:52 
你同时开了2个服，如果不是，在设置里面把server-ip：    后面的全部去掉
那多人時sever的ip填?

replies.author: shengzinz
replies.txt_content: 换一个IP 再开服务器~

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
萝卜玩mc 发表于 2013-8-1 15:42 
如果你内网映射了，就是外围ip，如果是hamachi，就是hamachi ip
那可不可以用192.168.1.106:25565
